(Does FindDi2015NewLine    // return null?)Di2015NewLine    return dictionary[found];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<ConcreteType> MapAndRecord(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> values, Func<T, ConcreteType> map,Di2015NewLine    IDictionary<ConcreteType, T> reverseMapping)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var value in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mapped = map(value);Di2015NewLine        reverseMapping[mapped] = value;Di2015NewLine        yield return mapped;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20694236Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T FindControlRecursive<T>(Control holder, string controlID) where T : ControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Control foundControl = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control ctrl in holder.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ctrl.GetType().Equals(typeof(T)) &&Di2015NewLine          (string.IsNullOrEmpty(controlID) || (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(controlID) && ctrl.ID.Equals(controlID))))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foundControl = ctrl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (ctrl.Controls.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foundControl = FindControlRecursive<T>(ctrl, controlID);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (foundControl != null)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (T)foundControl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20695715Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar previousValue = in_number[0];Di2015NewLinevar duplicates = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 1; i < in_number.Length; i++) // Note: starting at 1 instead of 0Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (previousValue == in_number[i] && !duplicates.ContainsKey(i))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        duplicates.Add(previousValue, i - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    previousValue = in_number[i];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20695715Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar first = new Dictionary<int, int>();      // Stores the first instance of each value and its indexDi2015NewLinevar duplicates = new Dictionary<int, int>(); // Stores any subsequent instances with the previous indexDi2015NewLinefor(int i = 0; i < in_number.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!first.ContainsKey(in_number[i]))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        first.Add(in_number[i], i);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    else if (!duplicates.ContainsKey(in_number[i]))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        duplicates.Add(in_number[i], first[in_number[i]]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorClient
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed partial class Client : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Called by producers to send data over the socket.Di2015NewLine    public void SendData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sender.SendData(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Consumers register to receive data.Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<DataReceivedEventArgs> DataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Client()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _client = new TcpClient(...);Di2015NewLine        _stream = _client.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _receiver = new Receiver(_stream);Di2015NewLine        _sender   = new Sender(_stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _receiver.DataReceived += OnDataReceived;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnDataReceived(object sender, DataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = DataReceived;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null) DataReceived(this, e);  // re-raise eventDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private TcpClient     _client;Di2015NewLine    private NetworkStream _stream;Di2015NewLine    private Receiver      _receiver;Di2015NewLine    private Sender        _sender;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate sealed partial class ClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private sealed class ReceiverDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal event EventHandler<DataReceivedEventArgs> DataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Receiver(NetworkStream stream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _stream = stream;Di2015NewLine            _thread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLine            _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // main thread loop for receiving data...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private NetworkStream _stream;Di2015NewLine        private Thread        _thread;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate sealed partial class ClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private sealed class SenderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal void SendData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // transition the data to the thread and send it...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Sender(NetworkStream stream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _stream = stream;Di2015NewLine            _thread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLine            _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // main thread loop for sending data...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private NetworkStream _stream;Di2015NewLine        private Thread        _thread;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorClient

20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorClient
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorNetworkStream.DataAvailable
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread.Sleep()
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorRead()
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorReadTimeout
20698153Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate sealed class ReceiverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // ShutdownEvent is a ManualResetEvent signaled byDi2015NewLine            // Client when its time to close the socket.Di2015NewLine            while (!ShutdownEvent.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // We could use the ReadTimeout property and let Read()Di2015NewLine                    // block.  However, if no data is received prior to theDi2015NewLine                    // timeout period expiring, an IOException occurs.Di2015NewLine                    // While this can be handled, it leads to problems whenDi2015NewLine                    // debugging if we are wanting to break when exceptionsDi2015NewLine                    // are thrown (unless we explicitly ignore IOException,Di2015NewLine                    // which I always forget to do).Di2015NewLine                    if (!_stream.DataAvailable)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Give up the remaining time slice.Di2015NewLine                        Thread.Sleep(1);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (_stream.Read(_data, 0, _data.Length) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Raise the DataReceived event w/ data...Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // The connection has closed gracefully, so stop theDi2015NewLine                        // thread.Di2015NewLine                        ShutdownEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (IOException ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Handle the exception...Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Handle the exception...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _stream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20700616Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Dictionary<Type, SqlDbType> types;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static SqlDbType GetSqlDbType(Type type, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (types == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        types = new Dictionary<Type, SqlDbType>();Di2015NewLine        types.Add(typeof(Int32), SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLine        types.Add(typeof(Int32?), SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLine        types.Add(typeof(decimal), SqlDbType.Decimal);Di2015NewLine        // etcDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SqlDbType result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (types.TryGetValue(type, out result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SqlDbType.VarBinary;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20700616Di2015UniqueSeparator    if (types.TryGetValue(type, out result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (typeof(Base).IsAssignableFrom(type))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SqlDbType.VarBinary;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // whatever, for example:Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20701010Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<PriceRow> GetABSPriceRows(string dekorNr, string bezeichnung, string hersteller)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<PriceRow> lstFoundPriceRows = _lstABSPriceRows; //_lstABSPriceRows is the source listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(dekorNr))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.FindAll(p => p.Artikelnummer.Contains(dekorNr));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(bezeichnung))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.FindAll(p => p.Bezeichnung.Contains(bezeichnung));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(hersteller))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.FindAll(p => p.Lieferant.Contains(hersteller));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lstFoundPriceRows;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20701010Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<PriceRow> GetABSPriceRows(string dekorNr, string bezeichnung, string hersteller)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<PriceRow> lstFoundPriceRows = _lstABSPriceRows; //_lstABSPriceRows is the source listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(dekorNr))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => p.Artikelnummer.Contains(dekorNr));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(bezeichnung))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => p.Bezeichnung.Contains(bezeichnung));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhitespace(hersteller))Di2015NewLine        lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => p.Lieferant.Contains(hersteller));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lstFoundPriceRows.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20701010Di2015UniqueSeparatorWhere
20701010Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<PriceRow> GetABSPriceRows(string dekorNr, string bezeichnung, string hersteller)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<PriceRow> lstFoundPriceRows = _lstABSPriceRows; //_lstABSPriceRows is the source listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => string.IsNullOrWhitespace(dekorNr) || p.Artikelnummer.Contains(dekorNr));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => string.IsNullOrWhitespace(bezeichnung) || p.Bezeichnung.Contains(bezeichnung));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lstFoundPriceRows = lstFoundPriceRows.Where(p => string.IsNullOrWhitespace(hersteller) || p.Lieferant.Contains(hersteller));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lstFoundPriceRows.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

= true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (retry)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var response = await httpClient.GetAsync(new Uri("http://oak:1001/ServerNotRunning"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK) retry = false;Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class OfflineHandler : DelegatingHandlerDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private readonly Uri _statusMonitorUri;Di2015NewLine            private readonly Dictionary<Uri, HttpResponseMessage> _offlineResponses = new Dictionary<Uri, HttpResponseMessage>();Di2015NewLine            private bool _isOffline = false;Di2015NewLine            private Timer _timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public OfflineHandler(HttpMessageHandler innerHandler, Uri statusMonitorUri)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _statusMonitorUri = statusMonitorUri;Di2015NewLine                InnerHandler = innerHandler;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void AddOfflineResponse(Uri uri, HttpResponseMessage response)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _offlineResponses.Add(uri,response);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            protected  async override Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_isOffline == true) return OfflineResponse(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var response = await base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine                    if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.ServiceUnavailable || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.BadGateway)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        MonitorOfflineState();Di2015NewLine                        return OfflineResponse(request);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return response;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MonitorOfflineState();Di2015NewLine                    return OfflineResponse(request);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void MonitorOfflineState()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _isOffline = true;Di2015NewLine                _timer = new Timer( async state =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var request = new HttpRequestMessage() {RequestUri = _statusMonitorUri};Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var response = await base.SendAsync(request, new CancellationToken());Di2015NewLine                        if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            _isOffline = false;Di2015NewLine                            _timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catchDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }, null, new TimeSpan(0,0,0),new TimeSpan(0,1,0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private HttpResponseMessage OfflineResponse(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_offlineResponses.ContainsKey(request.RequestUri))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return _offlineResponses[request.RequestUri];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return new HttpResponseMessage(HttpStatusCode.ServiceUnavailable);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20706265Di2015UniqueSeparator    private int MouseHookProc(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam) {Di2015NewLine        //Marshall the data from the callback.Di2015NewLine        MouseHookStruct MyMouseHookStruct = (MouseHookStruct)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(MouseHookStruct));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nCode < 0) {Di2015NewLine            return CallNextHookEx(hHookMouse, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            if (wParam.ToInt32() == WM_MOUSEMOVE) {Di2015NewLine                Screensaver_OnMouseMove(this, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return CallNextHookEx(hHookMouse, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int KeyboardHookProc(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam) {Di2015NewLine        //Marshall the data from the callback.Di2015NewLine        KeyboardHookStruct keyInfo = (KeyboardHookStruct)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(KeyboardHookStruct));Di2015NewLine        int VK_ESCAPE = 0x1B;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nCode < 0) {Di2015NewLine            return CallNextHookEx(hHookKeyboard, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            int keyCode = wParam.ToInt32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (keyCode == VK_ESCAPE) {Di2015NewLine                Application.Exit();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return CallNextHookEx(hHookKeyboard, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20707007Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Practices.Unity;Di2015NewLineusing Newtonsoft.Json;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestGroundsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class TestClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int TestIntegerProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string TestStringProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BadTestClass : TestClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double TestDoubleProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public BadTestClass(double testDouble)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TestDoubleProperty = testDouble;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Static MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string json =Di2015NewLine                @"{ TestIntegerProperty: 1, TestStringProperty: 'Hello', AnotherTestPropertyToIgnore: 'Sup' }";Di2015NewLine            var type = Type.GetType("TestGrounds.TestClass", true);Di2015NewLine            var badType = Type.GetType("TestGrounds.BadTestClass", true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            registerDependencyFromJson(type, json);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                registerDependencyFromJson(badType, json);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void registerDependencyFromJson(Type type, string json)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // type requires a default constructor for this to workDi2015NewLine            var constructor = type.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine            if(constructor == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Type must have a parameterless 20721273Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<Unit> AsObservable(this CancellationToken token, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<Unit>(observer =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var d1 = new SingleAssignmentDisposable();Di2015NewLine        return new CompositeDisposable(d1, token.Register(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                d1.Disposable = scheduler.Schedule(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnNext(Unit.Default);Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20721273Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IObservable<Unit> ScheduleWork(IObservable<Unit> cancelSignal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Performs work on an intervalDi2015NewLine    // stops the timer (but finishes any work in progress) when the cancelSignal is receivedDi2015NewLine    var workTimer = ObservableDi2015NewLine        .Timer(TimeSpan.Zero, TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10))Di2015NewLine        .TakeUntil(cancelSignal)Di2015NewLine        .Select(_ =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DoWork();Di2015NewLine            return Unit.Default;Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .IgnoreElements();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // starts a timer after cancellation that will eventually throw a timeout exception.Di2015NewLine    var timeoutAfterCancelSignal = cancelSignalDi2015NewLine        .SelectMany(c => Observable.Never<Unit>().Timeout(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use Amb to listen to both the workTimerDi2015NewLine    // and the timeoutAfterCancelSignalDi2015NewLine    // Since neither produce any data we are really justDi2015NewLine    // listening to see which will complete first.Di2015NewLine    // if the workTimer completes before the timeoutDi2015NewLine    // then Amb will complete without error.Di2015NewLine    // However if the timeout expires first, then AmbDi2015NewLine    // will produce an errorDi2015NewLine    return Observable.Amb(workTimer, timeoutAfterCancelSignal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// UsageDi2015NewLinevar cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLinevar s = ScheduleWork(cts.Token.AsObservable(Scheduler.Default));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var finishedSignal = new ManualResetSlim())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    s.Finally(finishedSignal.Set).Subscribe(Di2015NewLine        _ => { /* will never be called */},Di2015NewLine        error => { /* handle error */ },Di2015NewLine        () => { /* canceled without error */ } );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    finishedSignal.Wait();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20725762Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic double GetAngle(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var w = x2 - x1;Di2015NewLine    var h = y2 - y1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var atan = Math.Atan(h/w) / Math.PI * 180;Di2015NewLine    if( w < 0 && h <= 0)Di2015NewLine        atan -= 180;Di2015NewLine    if( w < 0 && h > 0)Di2015NewLine        atan += 180;Di2015NewLine    return (atan + 90) % 360;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

For this example,Di2015NewLine            // we'll just sleepDi2015NewLine            while (!messageReceived)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReceiveMessages(10000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20730121Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// If iterating data throws an exception, the target block is faultedDi2015NewLine/// and the returned Task completes successfully.Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// Depending on the usage, this might or might not be what you want.Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLinepublic static async Task SendAllAsync<T>(Di2015NewLine    this ITargetBlock<T> target, IEnumerable<T> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            await target.SendAsync(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        target.Fault(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20730121Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// boundedCapacity represents the capacity of the input queueDi2015NewLine/// and the output queue separately, not their total.Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLinepublic static IPropagatorBlock<TInput, TOutput>Di2015NewLine    CreateBoundedTransformManyBlock<TInput, TOutput>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TInput, IEnumerable<TOutput>> transform, int boundedCapacity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var input = new BufferBlock<TInput>(Di2015NewLine        new DataflowBlockOptions { BoundedCapacity = boundedCapacity });Di2015NewLine    var output = new BufferBlock<TOutput>(Di2015NewLine        new DataflowBlockOptions { BoundedCapacity = boundedCapacity });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.Run(Di2015NewLine        async () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (await input.OutputAvailableAsync())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var data = transform(await input.ReceiveAsync());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    await output.SendAllAsync(data);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output.Complete();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ((IDataflowBlock)input).Fault(e);Di2015NewLine                ((IDataflowBlock)output).Fault(e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return DataflowBlock.Encapsulate(input, output);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20733037Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLine    String text = "Magic banana is eating the apple.";Di2015NewLine    System.out.println("Old text: " + text);Di2015NewLine    System.out.println("New text: " + getEditedText(text));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String getEditedText(String text) {Di2015NewLine    StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();Di2015NewLine    Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("[A-Za-z][a-z]*");Di2015NewLine    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(text);Di2015NewLine    while (matcher.find()) {Di2015NewLine        matcher.appendReplacement(result, getReplacement(matcher));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    matcher.appendTail(result);Di2015NewLine    return result.toString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String getReplacement(Matcher matcher) {Di2015NewLine    String word = matcher.group(0);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < word.length(); i++) {Di2015NewLine        char c = word.charAt(i);Di2015NewLine        sb.append((char)(c + 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.toString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20734571Di2015UniqueSeparator//Console Application Example #3 ;)Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // List<Action<int>> is a List that stores objects of Type Action<int>Di2015NewLine    // Action<int> is a Delegate that represents methods thatDi2015NewLine    //  takes an int but does not return (example: void func(int val){/*code*/})Di2015NewLine    var myDelegates = new List<Action<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We add delegates to the listDi2015NewLine    myDelegates.Add(x => Console.WriteLine(x));Di2015NewLine    myDelegates.Add(x => Console.WriteLine(x + 5));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And we call them in succesionDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in myDelegates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        item(74);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparator74Di2015NewLine79Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparatorx => Console.WriteLine(x)
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparatorConsole.WriteLine(x + 5)
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparator//Console Application Example #3 ;)Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This ia delegate... we haven't give it a method to point to:Di2015NewLine    Action<int> myDelegates = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We add methods to itDi2015NewLine    myDelegates += x => Console.WriteLine(x);Di2015NewLine    myDelegates += x => Console.WriteLine(x + 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And we call them in successionDi2015NewLine    if (myDelegates != null) // Will be null if we don't add methodsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myDelegates(74);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparator74Di2015NewLine79Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparatorthis.button1.Click -= button1_Click;Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction<int> myDelegates = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create the delegate Di2015NewLinevar myDelegate = x => Console.WriteLine(x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Add the delegateDi2015NewLinemyDelegates += myDelegate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Remove the delegateDi2015NewLinemyDelegates -= myDelegate;Di2015NewLine
20734571Di2015UniqueSeparator// Event declaration:Di2015NewLinepublic event EventHandler MyEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Method to raise the event (aka event dispatcher):Di2015NewLinepriavet void Raise_MyEvent()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var myEvent = MyEvent;Di2015NewLine    if (myEvent != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var e = new EventArgs();Di2015NewLine        myEvent(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

loaded from.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var basePath = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().CodeBase.Replace("file:///", "");Di2015NewLine    var driveLetter = (UInt32)volumeNameBuffer.Capacity))Di2015NewLine        throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine    var volumeName = volumeNameBuffer.ToString().TrimEnd('\\\\'); // Remove trailing backslashDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // Open the volume and retrieve the disk number.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    UInt32 diskNumber;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr volume = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        volume = CreateFile(volumeName, FileAccess.GenericReadWrite, FileShare.ReadWriteDelete, IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine            FileCreation.OpenExisting, FileFlags.None, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        if (volume == (IntPtr)(-1))Di2015NewLine            throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 234 /*ERROR_MORE_DATA*/)Di2015NewLine                throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        diskNumber = extents.diskNumber;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (volume != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CloseHandle(volume);Di2015NewLine            volume = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // Build the physical disk name from the disk number.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    String physicalName = ("\\\\\\\\.\\\\PHYSICALDRIVE" + diskNumber).Replace("\\\\", "\\\\\\\\");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // Find information about the physical disk using WMI.Di2015NewLine 20737458Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Lcm(int[] x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length < 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Do not use this method if there are less than two numbers.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tmp = Lcm(x[x.Length - 1], x[x.Length - 2]);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = x.Length - 3; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x[i] < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Cannot compute the least common multiple of several numbers where one, at least, is negative.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            tmp = Lcm(tmp, x[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int Lcm(int x1, int x2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x1 < 0 || x2 < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Cannot compute the GCD if one integer is negative.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (x1 > x2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            a = x1;Di2015NewLine            b = x2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            a = x2;Di2015NewLine            b = x1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= b; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((a * i) % b == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return i * a;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20747811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomAuthenticationModule : IHttpModule Di2015NewLine      { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Init(HttpApplication httpApp) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                  httpApp.AuthorizeRequest += new EventHandler(this.AuthorizaRequest); Di2015NewLine                  httpApp.AuthenticateRequest += new EventHandler(this.AuthenticateRequest); Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            public void Dispose() Di2015NewLine            {} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void AuthorizaRequest( object sender, EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine            {     Di2015NewLine                  if (HttpContext.Current.User != null) Di2015NewLine                  { Di2015NewLine                         if (HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                              if (HttpContext.Current.User is MyAppPrincipal) Di2015NewLine                              { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                              MyAppPrincipal principal = (MyAppPrincipal) HttpContext.Current.User; Di2015NewLine                              if (!principal.IsPageEnabled(HttpContext.Current.Request.Path) ) Di2015NewLine                                          HttpContext.Current.Server.Transfer( "unauthorized.aspx"); Di2015NewLine                              } Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                  } Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void AuthenticateRequest(object sender, EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                  if (HttpContext.Current.User != null) Di2015NewLine                  { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                              if (HttpContext.Current.User.Identity is FormsIdentity) Di2015NewLine                              { Di2015NewLine                                    var id = HttpContext.Current.User.Identity; Di2015NewLine                                    FormsAuthenticationTicket ticket = id.Ticket; Di2015NewLine                                    string cookieName = System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName; Di2015NewLine                                    string userData = Di2015NewLine                                          System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Request.Cookies[cookieName].Value; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    ticket  = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt(userData); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    string department=""; Di2015NewLine                                    if( userData.Length > 0 ) Di2015NewLine                                          department= ticket.UserData; Di2015NewLine                                    HttpContext.Current.User = new Di2015NewLine                                    MyAppPrincipal(_identity, department);                          Di2015NewLine                              } Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                  } Di2015NewLine            }//AuthenticateRequest Di2015NewLine      } //class Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20756550Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int FindRequiredValue(int[] value) {Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, value))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine  else if (value.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("Empty arrays can't be proceeded.", "value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Algorithm:Di2015NewLine  // if the array contains odd negative numbers print out the maximum among them:Di2015NewLine  //   {-1, -2, -3, 4, 5} => -1Di2015NewLine  // if the array contains even negative numbers print out the smallest non-negative one:Di2015NewLine  //   {-1, -2, 4, 5} => 4Di2015NewLine  // if array contains even negative numbers and no non-negative numbers print out theDi2015NewLine  // smallest negative one Di2015NewLine  //   {-1, -2, -3, -4} => -4Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int max_Negative = 0;Di2015NewLine  int min_Negative = 0;Di2015NewLine  int min_NonNegative = -1;Di2015NewLine  int negativeCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (int v in value) {Di2015NewLine    if (v < 0) {Di2015NewLine      negativeCount += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if ((v > max_Negative) || (max_Negative == 0))Di2015NewLine        max_Negative = v;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if ((v < min_Negative) || (min_Negative == 0))Di2015NewLine        min_Negative = v;  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine      if ((v < min_NonNegative) || (min_NonNegative == -1))Di2015NewLine        min_NonNegative = v; Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if ((negativeCount % 2) == 1)Di2015NewLine    return max_Negative;Di2015NewLine  else if (min_NonNegative != -1)Di2015NewLine    return min_NonNegative;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    return min_Negative; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20759587Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static DataTable GetDataTabletFromCSVFile(string csv_file_path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable csvData = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          using(TextFieldParser csvReader = new TextFieldParser(csv_file_path))Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                csvReader.SetDelimiters(new string[] { "," });Di2015NewLine                csvReader.HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes = true;Di2015NewLine                string[] colFields = csvReader.ReadFields();Di2015NewLine                foreach (string column in colFields)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataColumn datecolumn = new DataColumn(column);Di2015NewLine                    datecolumn.AllowDBNull = true;Di2015NewLine                    csvData.Columns.Add(datecolumn);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (!csvReader.EndOfData)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string[] fieldData = csvReader.ReadFields();Di2015NewLine                    //Making empty value as nullDi2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < fieldData.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (fieldData[i] == "")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            fieldData[i] = null;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    csvData.Rows.Add(fieldData);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return csvData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

20780554Di2015UniqueSeparator        string longString = "Your long string goes here...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int chunkSize = 60;Di2015NewLine        int chunks = longString.Length / chunkSize;Di2015NewLine        int remaining = longString.Length % chunkSize;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder longStringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        int index;Di2015NewLine        for (index = 0; index < chunks * chunkSize; index += chunkSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            longStringBuilder.Append(longString.Substring(index, chunkSize));Di2015NewLine            longStringBuilder.Append(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (remaining != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            longStringBuilder.Append(longString.Substring(index, remaining));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string result = longStringBuilder.ToString().TrimEnd(Environment.NewLine.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine

20800364Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueue
20800364Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate ConcurrentQueue<Action> handlers = new ConcurrentQueue<Action>();Di2015NewLinepublic void Queue<TEvent>(TEvent e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    handlers.Enqueue(new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var handler in GetHandlers<TEvent>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(e);Di2015NewLine        }    Di2015NewLine    }));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Emit()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Action act;Di2015NewLine    while (handlers.TryDequeue(out act))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        act();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<Action<TEvent>> GetHandlers<TEvent>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ObjectFactory.GetAllInstances(typeof(Action<TEvent>>));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable
20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable From_Obj_Lst(object list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dt = null;Di2015NewLine    Type listType = list.GetType();Di2015NewLine    if (listType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type elementType = listType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine        dt = new DataTable(elementType.Name + "List");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AddColumns(ref dt, elementType, "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IList il = list as IList;Di2015NewLine        foreach (object record in il)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            object[] fieldValues = new object[dt.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn c in dt.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fieldValues[i] = GetValueByColumnName(c.ColumnName, record);Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dt.Rows.Add(fieldValues);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorClassA

20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorClassB

20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorClassC
20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddColumns(ref DataTable dt, Type elementType, string columnPrefix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemberInfo[] miArray = elementType.GetMembers(Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    foreach (MemberInfo mi in miArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (mi.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo pi = mi as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine            if (pi.PropertyType.IsPrimitive || pi.PropertyType == typeof(String))Di2015NewLine                dt.Columns.Add(columnPrefix + pi.Name, Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(pi.PropertyType) ?? pi.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            else AddColumns(ref dt, pi.PropertyType, String.Format("{0}{1}.", columnPrefix, pi.Name));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (mi.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo fi = mi as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine            if (fi.FieldType.IsPrimitive || fi.FieldType == typeof(String))Di2015NewLine                dt.Columns.Add(columnPrefix + fi.Name, fi.FieldType);Di2015NewLine            else AddColumns(ref dt, fi.FieldType, String.Format("{0}{1}.", columnPrefix, fi.Name));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20800483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object GetValueByColumnName(string colName, object record)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var isComplexProperty = colName.Split('.').Length > 1;Di2015NewLine    if (!isComplexProperty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetSimplePropertyValue(colName, record);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyName = colName.Split('.')[0];Di2015NewLine        var propertyValue = GetSimplePropertyValue(propertyName, record);Di2015NewLine        if (propertyValue != null)Di2015NewLine            return GetValueByColumnName(colName.Replace(propertyName + ".", ""), propertyValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object GetSimplePropertyValue(string propName, object record)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type elementType = record.GetType();Di2015NewLine    MemberInfo mi = elementType.GetMember(propName)[0];Di2015NewLine    if (mi.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo pi = mi as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        return pi.GetValue(record, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (mi.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo fi = mi as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine        return fi.GetValue(record);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20801339Di2015UniqueSeparatorMemoryStream
20801339Di2015UniqueSeparator    void cam_Completed(object sender, PhotoResult e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.TaskResult == TaskResult.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream memo = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                e.ChosenPhoto.CopyTo(memo);Di2015NewLine                memo.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                using (ExifReader reader = new ExifReader(memo))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    double[] latitudeComponents;Di2015NewLine                    reader.GetTagValue(ExifTags.GPSLatitude, out latitudeComponents);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    double[] longitudeComponents;Di2015NewLine                    reader.GetTagValue(ExifTags.GPSLongitude, out longitudeComponents);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Lat/long are stored as DÂ°M'S" arrays, so you will need to reconstruct their values as below:Di2015NewLine                    var latitude = latitudeComponents[0] + latitudeComponents[1] / 60 + latitudeComponents[2] / 3600;Di2015NewLine                    var longitude = longitudeComponents[0] + longitudeComponents[1] / 60 + longitudeComponents[2] / 3600;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // latitude and longitude should now be set correctly...Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20802654Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IList<IList<int>> EqualArrays(List<int[]> list) {Di2015NewLine      IList<IList<int>> result = new List<IList<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      HashSet<int> proceeded = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; ++i) {Di2015NewLine        if (proceeded.Contains(i))Di2015NewLine          continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] item = list[i];Di2015NewLine        List<int> equals = new List<int>() { i };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result.Add(equals);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < list.Count; ++j)Di2015NewLine          if (item.SequenceEqual(list[j])) {Di2015NewLine            equals.Add(j);Di2015NewLine            proceeded.Add(j);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Your test case:Di2015NewLine   List<int[]> list = new List<int[]>() {Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 7},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2, 3},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2, 3},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2, 3},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 3},Di2015NewLine     new int[] {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 7}Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // anotherList == {{0, 7}, {1}, {2, 4, 5}, {3}, {6}}Di2015NewLine   IList<IList<int>> anotherList = EqualArrays(list);Di2015NewLine

20804177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class NavigationHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString BuildNavigation(this HtmlHelper htmlHelper, IEnumerable<NavigationItem> navigationItems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var container = new TagBuilder("ul");Di2015NewLine        container.MergeAttribute("id", "menu");Di2015NewLine        var innerHtmlBuilder = new Di2015NewLine                        item.RouteValueDictionary, null).ToHtmlString()Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        container.InnerHtml = innerHtmlBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        return new MvcHtmlString(container.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsAuthorized(this HtmlHelper htmlHelper, RouteValueDictionary routeValues)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var routeData = BuildRouteData(htmlHelper.RouteCollection, routeValues);Di2015NewLine        var context = BuildRequestContext(htmlHelper, routeData);Di2015NewLine        return ClaimsAuthorizationHelper.CheckAccess(context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static RouteData BuildRouteData(IEnumerable<RouteBase> routeCollection, RouteValueDictionary routeValues)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object controllerValue;Di2015NewLine routeValues.TryGetValue("area", out areaValue);Di2015NewLine        var areaName = areaValue as String ?? "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var routeData = new RouteData();Di2015NewLine        routeData.Values.Add("action", actionName);Di2015NewLine        routeData.Values.Add("controller", controllerName);Di2015NewLine        routeData.Values.Add("area", areaName);Di2015NewLine        AddNamespaceInfo(routeData, routeCollection, areaName, controllerName, actionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return routeData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static RequestContext BuildRequestContext(this HtmlHelper htmlHelper, RouteData routeData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var claimsPrincipal = htmlHelper.ViewContext.HttpContext.User as ClaimsPrincipal;Di2015NewLine        var requestContext = new RequestContext(htmlHelper.ViewContext.HttpContext, routeData);Di2015NewLine        requestContext.HttpContext.User = claimsPrincipal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return requestContext;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddNamespaceInfo(RouteData routeData, IEnumerable<RouteBase> routeCollection, string areaName, string controllerName, string actionName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var route = routeCollection.GetRoute(areaName, controllerName, actionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (route != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            routeData.DataTokens.Add("Namespaces", route.DataTokens["Namespaces"]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20807950Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetGenericTypeDefinition
20807950Di2015UniqueSeparatorType testType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineType firstCheck = typeof(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<>);Di2015NewLinebool isExpression = Di2015NewLine    (testType.IsGenericType && testType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == firstCheck)Di2015NewLine    || (!testType.IsGenericType && testType == firstCheck);Di2015NewLine
20807950Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsTypeCompatibile(Type pattern, Type test, Type placeholder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (pattern == test || pattern == placeholder)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(pattern.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!test.IsGenericType || pattern.GetGenericTypeDefinition() != test.GetGenericTypeDefinition())Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var patternGenericTypes = pattern.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine        var testGenericTypes = test.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return patternGenericTypes.Length == testGenericTypes.LengthDi2015NewLine            && patternGenericTypes.Zip(testGenericTypes, (p, t) => IsTypeCompatibile(p, t, placeholder)).All(x => x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20809716Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bb = new BufferBlock<string>();Di2015NewLine    var db = DataflowEx.CreateDistinctBlock<string>();Di2015NewLine    var ab = new ActionBlock<string>(x => Console.WriteLine(x));Di2015NewLine    bb.LinkTo(db);Di2015NewLine    db.LinkTo(ab);Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("this");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("this");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("this");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("is");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("is");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("a");Di2015NewLine    bb.Post("test");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DataflowExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static TransformManyBlock<T, T> CreateDistinctBlock<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hs = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine        //hs will be captured in the closure of the delegateDi2015NewLine        //supplied to the TransformManyBlock below and thereforeDi2015NewLine        //will have the same lifespan as the returned block.Di2015NewLine        //Look up the term "c# closure" for more infoDi2015NewLine        return new TransformManyBlock<T, T>(Di2015NewLine                         x => Enumerable.Repeat(x, hs.Add(x) ? 1 : 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20810146Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static volatile object locker = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Process()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool lockWasTaken = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Monitor.TryEnter(locker))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lockWasTaken = true;Di2015NewLine                //Process Queue...Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lockWasTaken)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(locker);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20810146Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static int status = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Process()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool lockWasTaken = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lockWasTaken = Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref status, 1, 0) == 0;Di2015NewLine            if (lockWasTaken)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Process Queue...Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (lockWasTaken)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.VolatileWrite(ref status, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20811083Di2015UniqueSeparator//split a long string into seperate lines ONLY where there are spacesDi2015NewLine// - does not begin a new line half way through a wordDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<string> NewSplit(string @this, int lineLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    var currentWord = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //for each individual characterDi2015NewLine    foreach (var c in @this)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //add the current character to the currentWord stringDi2015NewLine        currentWord += c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //if character is a space between wordsDi2015NewLine        if (char.IsWhiteSpace(c))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if the current word and current string on the current lineDi2015NewLine            //is greater than the line character lengthDi2015NewLine            if (currentString.Length + currentWord.Length > lineLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //return the current string without adding the extra wordDi2015NewLine                yield return currentString;Di2015NewLine                //empty the currentString variableDi2015NewLine                currentString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //add the space character and the current word to the currentStringDi2015NewLine            currentString += currentWord;Di2015NewLine            //empty the currentWord variableDi2015NewLine            currentWord = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // print last line combined if length is less or equal to line length limitDi2015NewLine    if (currentString.Length + currentWord.Length <= lineLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return currentString + currentWord;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return currentString;Di2015NewLine        if(!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(currentWord))Di2015NewLine            yield return currentWord;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20815064Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpResponse.RedirectPermanent
20815064Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RedirectPermanent(string url, bool endResponse = true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpResponse responce = HttpContext.Current.Response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #if DEBUGDi2015NewLine    if (url == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("url");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (responce == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("url");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (url.IndexOf('\\n') >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Cannot_redirect_to_newline");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Page handler = HttpContext.Current.Handler as Page;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((handler != null) && handler.IsCallback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("Redirect_not_allowed_in_callback");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    url = responce.ApplyAppPathModifier(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    responce.Clear();Di2015NewLine    responce.TrySkipIisCustomErrors = true;Di2015NewLine    responce.StatusCode = 301;Di2015NewLine    responce.Status = "301 Moved Permanently";Di2015NewLine    responce.RedirectLocation = url;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // a direct header diferent way Di2015NewLine    // responce.AddHeader("Location", url);     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    responce.Write("<html><head><title>Object moved</title></head><body>\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    responce.Write("<h2>Object moved to <a href=\\"" + url + "\\">here</a>.</h2>\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    responce.Write("</body></html>\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (endResponse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        responce.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20818923Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CostsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Category { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double Sum { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Date { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20819166Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Processes the given kernel to produce an array of pixels representing a Di2015NewLine/// bitmap.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="pixels">The raw pixels of the image to blur</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="kernel">Di2015NewLine/// The Gaussian kernel to use when performing the method</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>An array of pixels representing the bitmap.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic Pixel[,] ProcessKernel(Pixel[,] pixels, double[,] kernel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int width = pixels.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    int height = pixels.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    int kernelLength = kernel.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    int radius = kernelLength >> 1;Di2015NewLine    int kernelSize = kernelLength * kernelLength;Di2015NewLine    Pixel[,] result = new Pixel[width, height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For each lineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // For each pixelDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The number of kernel elements taken into accountDi2015NewLine            int processedKernelSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Colour sumsDi2015NewLine            double blue;Di2015NewLine            double alpha;Di2015NewLine            double divider;Di2015NewLine            double green;Di2015NewLine            double red = green = blue = alpha = divider = Di2015NewLine                         processedKernelSize = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // For each kernel rowDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < kernelLength; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int ir = i - radius;Di2015NewLine                int iposition = y + ir;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Skip the current rowDi2015NewLine                if (iposition < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Outwith the current bounds so break.Di2015NewLine                if (iposition >= height)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // For each kernel columnDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < kernelLength; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int jr = j - radius;Di2015NewLine                    int jposition = x + jr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Skip the columnDi2015NewLine                    if (jposition < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (jposition < width)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        double k = kernel[i, j];Di2015NewLine                        Pixel pixel = pixels[jposition, iposition];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        divider += k;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        red += k * pixel.R;Di2015NewLine                        green += k * pixel.G;Di2015NewLine                        blue += k * pixel.B;Di2015NewLine                        alpha += k * pixel.A;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        processedKernelSize++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check to see if all kernel elements were processedDi2015NewLine            if (processedKernelSize == kernelSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // All kernel elements are processed; we are not on the edge.Di2015NewLine                divider = this.Divider;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // We are on an edge; do we need to use dynamic divider or not?Di2015NewLine                if (!this.UseDynamicDividerForEdges)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Apply the set divider.Di2015NewLine                    divider = this.Divider;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check and apply the dividerDi2015NewLine            if ((long)divider != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                red /= divider;Di2015NewLine                green /= divider;Di2015NewLine                blue /= divider;Di2015NewLine                alpha /= divider;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add any applicable threshold.Di2015NewLine            red += this.Threshold;Di2015NewLine            green += this.Threshold;Di2015NewLine            blue += this.Threshold;Di2015NewLine            alpha += this.Threshold;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result[x, y].R = (byte)((red > 255) Di2015NewLine                           ? 255 : ((red < 0) ? 0 : red));               Di2015NewLine            result[x, y].G = (byte)((green > 255) Di2015NewLine                           ? 255 : ((green < 0) ? 0 : green));Di2015NewLine            result[x, y].B = (byte)((blue > 255) Di2015NewLine                           ? 255 : ((blue < 0) ? 0 : blue));Di2015NewLine            result[x, y].A = (byte)((alpha > 255) Di2015NewLine                           ? 255 : ((alpha < 0) ? 0 : alpha));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20819170Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic JsonResult registration(Solnet_HotelSuite.Models.UserModels user, string userID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    { 20819950Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap img2 = new Bitmap(@"C:\\ImageOne.png");Di2015NewLineImageConverter converter = new ImageConverter();Di2015NewLinebyte[] img2Bytes = (byte[])converter.ConvertTo(img2, typeof(byte[]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (string s in Directory.GetFiles(@"C:\\Images"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap img1 = new Bitmap(s);Di2015NewLine    byte[] img1Bytes = (byte[])converter.ConvertTo(img1, typeof(byte[]));Di2015NewLine    if (CompareImages(img1Bytes,img2Bytes))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logging("Identical");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logging("Not Identical");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    img1.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool CompareImages(byte[] b1, byte[] b2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   EqualityComparer<byte> comparer = EqualityComparer<byte>.Default;Di2015NewLine   if (b1.Length == b2.Length)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       for (int i = 0; i < b1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           if (!comparer.Equals(b1[i], b2[i])) return false;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    } else { return false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20820299Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<char, UInt32> ColumnStyles(Worksheet worksheet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Columns columns = worksheet.GetFirstChild<Columns>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char colIndex = 'A';Di2015NewLine    for (Column column = (Column)columns.FirstChild; column != null; column = (Column)column.NextSibling())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UInt32 Min   = column.Min.Value;Di2015NewLine        UInt32 Max   = column.Max.Value;Di2015NewLine        UInt32 Style = column.Style.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= Max - Min + 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StyleOf[colIndex++] = Style;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return StyleOf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20824046Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Application_Error()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var exception = Server.GetLastError();Di2015NewLine    var httpException = exception as HttpException;Di2015NewLine    Response.Clear();Di2015NewLine    Server.ClearError();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var routeData = new RouteData();Di2015NewLine    routeData.Values["controller"] = "Errors";Di2015NewLine    routeData.Values["action"] = "Http500";Di2015NewLine    routeData.Values["exception"] = exception;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Response.StatusCode = 500;Di2015NewLine    Response.TrySkipIisCustomErrors = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (httpException != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Response.StatusCode = httpException.GetHttpCode();Di2015NewLine        switch (Response.StatusCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 403:Di2015NewLine                routeData.Values["action"] = "Http403";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 404:Di2015NewLine                routeData.Values["action"] = "Http404";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // TODO: Add other cases if you want to handleDi2015NewLine            // different status codes from your Web APIDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IController errorsController = new ErrorsController();Di2015NewLine    var rc = new RequestContext(new HttpContextWrapper(Context), routeData);Di2015NewLine    errorsController.Execute(rc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20824234Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void BindTreeview()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataRow[] parentRows = mDataSet.Tables[0].Select("parentid = " + ROOT_PARENT_ID.ToString()); // # Get all root nodesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in parentRows) // # Add all root nodes to treeview and call for child nodesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode node = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine        node.Text = row["catname"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        tvCategories.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine        AddChildNodes((int)row["catid"], node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddChildNodes(int catId, TreeNode node) // # Recursive method to add child nodes and call for child nodes of each child nodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataRow[] childRows = mDataSet.Tables[0].Select("parentid = " + catId.ToString()); // # Get all child nodes of given nodeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (childRows.Length == 0) { return; } // # Recursion base case; if given node has no child nodes no more action is takenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in childRows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode childNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine        childNode.Text = row["catname"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        node.Nodes.Add(childNode);Di2015NewLine        AddChildNodes((int)row["catid"], childNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20825883Di2015UniqueSeparator// I. here we inherit from more sophisticated class, created for usDi2015NewLineinternal class StringNullConverter<T> : CustomCreationConverter<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // II. thanks the new() constraint we can override this method easilyDi2015NewLine    public override T Create(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new T();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (objectType == typeof(string)) || (objectType == typeof(List<string>));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // III. here we pass the rest to smart baseDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.String)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // this is the correct implementationDi2015NewLine        return base.ReadJson(reader, objectType, existingValue, serializer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // unchangedDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20829572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CalculationPair<TEntityType, TProperty>Di2015NewLine    where TEntityType : classDi2015NewLine    where TProperty : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // not sure that first three properties are needed hereDi2015NewLine    public ValueTypeProperty<TEntityType, TProperty> Left { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Operand Operand { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public ValueTypeProperty<TEntityType, TProperty> Right { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // closure methodDi2015NewLine    public Func<TEntityType, TProperty> Calculator { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20829572Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (var product in products)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (product.Type == ProductType.Fixed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CalculationPair<Product, float> calculation = new CalculationPair<Product, float>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Left = new ProductPriceProperty() { Name = "Product Price", PropertyExpression = (entity => entity.Price) },Di2015NewLine            Operand = new Operand() { Type = OperandType.Multiplication },Di2015NewLine            Right = new ProductPriceProperty() { Name = "ExportFactor", PropertyExpression = (entity => config.Dictionary["ExportFactor"]) },Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // only this property is needed, and it will handle reference to config object in the closureDi2015NewLine            Calculator = (entity) => entity.Price * config.Dictionary["ExportFactor"]Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Once calculation has been reconstruction from the persistence layer, it needs to be executed.Di2015NewLine        product.Price = calculation.Calculator(product);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20829572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ParameterRewriter : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _expToRewrite;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParameterRewriter(ParameterExpression expToRewrite)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._expToRewrite = expToRewrite;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we just use type checking to understand that it's our parameter, and we replace it with new oneDi2015NewLine        if (node.Type == this._expToRewrite.Type) return this._expToRewrite;Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20829572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CalculationPair<TEntityType, TProperty>Di2015NewLine    where TEntityType : classDi2015NewLine    where TProperty : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ValueTypeProperty<TEntityType, TProperty> Left { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Operand Operand { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public ValueTypeProperty<TEntityType, TProperty> Right { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TResult Calculate<TResult>(TEntityType entity)Di2015NewLine        where TResult : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TResult result = default(TResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var prop = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntityType), "param");Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new ParameterRewriter(prop);Di2015NewLine        var leftExp = visitor.Visit(Left.PropertyExpression.Body);Di2015NewLine        var rightExp = visitor.Visit(Right.PropertyExpression.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (this.Operand.Type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case OperandType.Multiplication:Di2015NewLine                body = Expression.Multiply(leftExp, rightExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case OperandType.Addition:Di2015NewLine                body = Expression.Add(leftExp, rightExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case OperandType.Division:Di2015NewLine                body = Expression.Divide(leftExp, rightExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case OperandType.Sunbtraction:Di2015NewLine                body = Expression.Subtract(leftExp, rightExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Unknown operand type");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntityType, TResult>>(body, prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compilation is long operation, so you might need to store this Func as property and don't compile it each timeDi2015NewLine        var func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        result = func(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20829990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Total(this IEnumerable<Item> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int confirmedTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine    int unconfirmedTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine    int unconfirmedCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (item.IsConfirmed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            confirmedTotal += item.Qty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unconfirmedCount++;Di2015NewLine            unconfirmedTotal += item.Qty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (unconfirmedCount == 0)Di2015NewLine        return confirmedTotal;Di2015NewLine    // NOTE: Will not throw if there is no unconfirmed itemsDi2015NewLine    return confirmedTotal + unconfirmedTotal / unconfirmedCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
