20835313Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void LaunchApplication(string runCommand, string commandArguments, string workingDir, string informMessage, Action<string> redirectOutput, Action<string> redirectError)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process applicationProcess = new Process();Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.StartInfo.FileName = runCommand;Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.StartInfo.WorkingDirectory = workingDir;Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.StartInfo.Arguments = commandArguments;Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (redirectOutput != null)Di2015NewLine            applicationProcess.OutputDataReceived += (s, data) => redirectOutput(data.Data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (redirectError != null)Di2015NewLine            applicationProcess.ErrorDataReceived += (sErr, errData) => redirectError(errData.Data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GeneralUtils.WriteHeadlineToConsole(informMessage);Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.Start();Di2015NewLine        if (redirectOutput != null)Di2015NewLine            applicationProcess.BeginOutputReadLine();Di2015NewLine        if (redirectError != null)Di2015NewLine            applicationProcess.BeginErrorReadLine();Di2015NewLine        applicationProcess.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine        GeneralUtils.WriteHeadlineToConsole("Finished " + informMessage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20837278Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT CASE Di2015NewLine         WHEN Len(active_start_time) = 4 THEN Cast( Di2015NewLine         Dateadd(minute, active_start_time / Di2015NewLine                         100, '00:00') AS TIME) Di2015NewLine         ELSE LEFT(RIGHT('0' + Cast(active_start_time AS VARCHAR), 6), 2) Di2015NewLine              + ':' Di2015NewLine              + Substring(RIGHT('0' + Cast(active_start_time AS VARCHAR), 6), 3, Di2015NewLine              2) Di2015NewLine              + ':' Di2015NewLine              + RIGHT(Cast(active_start_time AS VARCHAR), 2) Di2015NewLine       END AS [Start time] Di2015NewLineFROM   msdb..sysschedules Di2015NewLine       INNER JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobschedules Di2015NewLine               ON msdb.dbo.sysjobschedules.schedule_id = Di2015NewLine                  msdb..sysschedules.schedule_id Di2015NewLine       INNER JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobs Di2015NewLine               ON msdb.dbo.sysjobs.job_id = msdb.dbo.sysjobschedules.job_id Di2015NewLineWHERE  msdb.dbo.sysjobs.name = 'Daily Trends' Di2015NewLine

               strategy = new ActionExecutionStrategy { Behavior = this };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Creates an EventHandler on runtime and registers that handler to the Event specifiedDi2015NewLine        public void BindEvent(DependencyObject owner, {0}", EventName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create an event handler for the event that will call the ExecuteCommand methodDi2015NewLine            EventHandler = this);Di2015NewLine            //Register the handler to the EventDi2015NewLine            Event.AddEventHandler(Owner, EventHandler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void SetBehavior(DependencyObject d, CommandBehaviorBinding value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(BehaviorProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region CommandDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Command Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty CommandProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("Command", typeof(ICommand), typeof(CommandBehavior),Di2015NewLine                new FrameworkPropertyMetadata((ICommand)null,Di2015NewLine                    new PropertyChangedCallback(OnCommandChanged)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the Command property.  Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static ICommand GetCommand(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (ICommand)d.GetValue(CommandProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the Command property. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetCommand(DependencyObject d, ICommand value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(CommandProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles changes to the Command property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void OnCommandChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CommandBehaviorBinding binding = FetchOrCreateBinding(d);Di2015NewLine            binding.Command = (ICommand)e.NewValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ActionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Action Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty ActionProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("Action", typeof(Action<object>), typeof(CommandBehavior),Di2015NewLine                new FrameworkPropertyMetadata((Action<object>)null,Di2015NewLine                    new PropertyChangedCallback(OnActionChanged)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the Action property.  Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static Action<object> GetAction(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Action<object>)d.GetValue(ActionProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the Action property. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetAction(DependencyObject d, Action<object> value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(ActionProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles changes to the Action property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void OnActionChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CommandBehaviorBinding binding = FetchOrCreateBinding(d);Di2015NewLine            binding.Action = (Action<object>)e.NewValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region CommandParameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// CommandParameter Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty CommandParameterProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("CommandParameter", typeof(object), typeof(CommandBehavior),Di2015NewLine                new FrameworkPropertyMetadata((object)null,Di2015NewLine                    new PropertyChangedCallback(OnCommandParameterChanged)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the CommandParameter property.  Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static object GetCommandParameter(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (object)d.GetValue(CommandParameterProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the CommandParameter property. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetCommandParameter(DependencyObject d, object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(CommandParameterProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles changes to the CommandParameter property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void OnCommandParameterChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CommandBehaviorBinding binding = FetchOrCreateBinding(d);Di2015NewLine            binding.CommandParameter = e.NewValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region EventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Event Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty EventProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("Event", typeof(string), typeof(CommandBehavior),Di2015NewLine                new FrameworkPropertyMetadata((string)String.Empty,Di2015NewLine                    new PropertyChangedCallback(OnEventChanged)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the Event property.  This dependency property Di2015NewLine        /// indicates ....Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static string GetEvent(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (string)d.GetValue(EventProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the Event property.  This dependency property Di2015NewLine        /// indicates ....Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetEvent(DependencyObject d, string value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(EventProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles changes to the Event property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void OnEventChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CommandBehaviorBinding binding = FetchOrCreateBinding(d);Di2015NewLine            //check if the Event is set. If yes we need to rebind the Command to the new event and unregister the old oneDi2015NewLine            if (binding.Event != null && binding.Owner != null)Di2015NewLine                binding.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            //bind the new event to the commandDi2015NewLine            binding.BindEvent(d, e.NewValue.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region HelpersDi2015NewLine        //tries to get a CommandBehaviorBinding from the element. Creates a new instance if there is not one attachedDi2015NewLine        private static CommandBehaviorBinding FetchOrCreateBinding(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CommandBehaviorBinding binding = CommandBehavior.GetBehavior(d);Di2015NewLine            if (binding == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                binding = new CommandBehaviorBinding();Di2015NewLine                CommandBehavior.SetBehavior(d, binding);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return binding;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20838117Di2015UniqueSeparatorobj == null
20838117Di2015UniqueSeparator  public override Boolean Equals(Object obj) {Di2015NewLine    // If obj is actually "this" then trueDi2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(this, obj))Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "as " is better the "is" + "(RatiosAVG)" Di2015NewLine    RatiosAVG other = obj as RatiosAVG;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // obj is either null or not a RatiosAVGDi2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, other))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // When you have 3 properties to compare, reflection is a bad idea Di2015NewLine    if (other.Value != Value)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    else if (!String.Equals(other.Name, Name, StringComparison.Ordinal))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    else if (!Object.Equals(other.Obj, Obj))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Finally, dictionaries. If, the criterium is: Di2015NewLine    // "Dictionaries are considered being equal if and only Di2015NewLine    // if they have the same {key, value} pairs"Di2015NewLine    // you can use Linq: SequenceEqual. Di2015NewLine    // Otherwise you should provide details for the dictionaries comparisonDi2015NewLine    if (!Enumerable.SequenceEqual(other.Dict1, Dict1))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    else if (!Enumerable.SequenceEqual(other.Dict2, Dict2))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Do not forget to override GetHashCode:Di2015NewLine  public override int GetHashCode() {Di2015NewLine    return Value; // <- Simplest version; probably you have to put more elaborated oneDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

20839485Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<PointF> ExtendPoints(PointF pt1, PointF pt4, int numberOfPoints)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine       extendedPoints = new List<PointF>();Di2015NewLine       extendedPoints.Add(pt1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       for(double d = 1; d < numberOfPoints-1; d++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            float a = (Math.Max(pt1.X, pt4.X) - Math.Min(pt1.X, pt4.X)) * d / (double)(numberOfPoints-1) + Math.Min(pt1.X, pt4.X);Di2015NewLine            float b = (Math.Max(pt1.Y, pt4.Y) - Math.Min(pt1.Y, pt4.Y)) * d / (double)(numberOfPoints-1) + Math.Min(pt1.Y, pt4.Y);Di2015NewLine            var pt2 = new PointF(a, b);Di2015NewLine            extendedPoints.Add(pt2);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       extendedPoints.Add(pt4);Di2015NewLine       return extendedPoints;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20840869Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class TcpSenderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Mutex moveToInternal = new Mutex();Di2015NewLine        Mutex startOnce = new Mutex();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Message> internalMessages = new List<Message>();Di2015NewLine        List<Message> externalMessages = new List<Message>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread mainLoop;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String status = "stopped";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //returns true if started.Di2015NewLine        public Boolean Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (startOnce.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                status = "started";Di2015NewLine                mainLoop = new Thread(new ThreadStart(InternalMainLoop));Di2015NewLine                mainLoop.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine                mainLoop.Start();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void InternalMainLoop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (status == "started")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Boolean didSomething = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //pickup new messages and move to internal bufferDi2015NewLine                    if (externalMessages.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        didSomething = true;Di2015NewLine                        if (moveToInternal.WaitOne())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            internalMessages.AddRange(externalMessages);Di2015NewLine                            externalMessages.Clear();Di2015NewLine                            moveToInternal.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //deliver messagesDi2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < internalMessages.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //send requestDi2015NewLine                        Byte[] data = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(internalMessages[i].GetMessage());Di2015NewLine                        NetworkStream stream = internalMessages[i].GetClient().GetStream();Di2015NewLine                        stream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    internalMessages.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!didSomething) Thread.Sleep(1); //Nothing to receive or send, maybe tomorr... next milisec there is something to doDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                startOnce.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Stop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            status = "stopped";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Boolean Status()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (status == "started");Di2015NewLine 20842037Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string DecryptData(string encryptedMessage, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (encryptedMessage.Length % 2 == 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("The binary key cannot have an odd number of digits");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] byteArr = new byte[encryptedMessage.Length / 2];Di2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < byteArr.Length; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string byteValue = encryptedMessage.Substring(index * 2, 2);Di2015NewLine            byteArr[index] = byte.Parse(byteValue, NumberStyles.HexNumber, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] result = Rijndael.DecryptData(Di2015NewLine            byteArr,Di2015NewLine            Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(password),Di2015NewLine            new byte[] { }, // Initialization vectorDi2015NewLine            Rijndael.BlockSize.Block256, // Typically 128 in most implementationsDi2015NewLine            Rijndael.KeySize.Key256,Di2015NewLine            Rijndael.EncryptionMode.ModeCBCDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetString(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20842582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<PointF> DistributePoints(PointF pt1, PointF pt4, int number_of_points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<PointF> result=new List<PointF>();Di2015NewLine    float x_min=Math.Min(pt1.X, pt4.X), x_max=Math.Max(pt1.X, pt4.X);Di2015NewLine    float y_min=Math.Min(pt1.Y, pt4.Y), y_max=Math.Max(pt1.Y, pt4.Y);Di2015NewLine    if(number_of_points<2) throw new ArgumentException("Need Two Points At Least");Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<number_of_points; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float scale=(float)i/(number_of_points-1);Di2015NewLine        float x=x_min+(x_max-x_min)*scale, y=y_min+(y_max-y_min)*scale;Di2015NewLine        result.Add(new PointF(x, y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20842582Di2015UniqueSeparator{Di2015NewLine    var res=DistributePoints(new PointF(100, 20), new PointF(10, 200), 11);Di2015NewLine    // res = Di2015NewLine    // ( 10.0,  20.0)Di2015NewLine    // ( 19.0,  38.0)Di2015NewLine    // ( 28.0,  56.0)Di2015NewLine    // ..Di2015NewLine    // ( 91.0, 182.0)Di2015NewLine    // (100.0, 200.0)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20844709Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Tuple<double, double> A(double[] samples, double interval)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double theta = (interval + 1.0)/2;Di2015NewLine    double mean = samples.Mean();Di2015NewLine    double sd = samples.StandardDeviation();Di2015NewLine    double T = StudentT.InvCDF(0,1,samples.Length-1,theta);Di2015NewLine    double t = T * (sd / Math.Sqrt(samples.Length));Di2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(mean-t, mean+t);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

new INotifyPropertyChanged[0]).OfType<INotifyPropertyChanged>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in oldItems)Di2015NewLine                item.PropertyChanged -= item_PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When item(s) are added, subscribe to property notifications.Di2015NewLine        if (e.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newItems = (e.NewItems ?? new INotifyPropertyChanged[0]).OfType<INotifyPropertyChanged>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in newItems)Di2015NewLine                item.PropertyChanged += item_PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NOTE: I'm not handling NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset.Di2015NewLine        // You'll want to look into when this event is raised and handle itDi2015NewLine        // in a special fashion.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void item_PropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.PropertyName.StartsWith("ObjectA."))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Refresh any dependent views, forms, controls, whatever...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20850060Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ActionWithDelayDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Action Work { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public TimeSpan DelayAfter { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static async Task Run(IEnumerable<ActionWithDelay> actions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var action in actions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action.Work();Di2015NewLine            await Task.Delay(action.DelayAfter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var actions = new[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new ActionWithDelay { Work = () => Console.WriteLine("Step 1"), DelayAfter = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10) },Di2015NewLine            new ActionWithDelay { Work = () => Console.WriteLine("Step 2"), DelayAfter = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5) },Di2015NewLine            new ActionWithDelay { Work = () => Console.WriteLine("Step 3"), DelayAfter = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5) },Di2015NewLine            new ActionWithDelay { Work = () => Console.WriteLine("Step 4"), DelayAfter = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10) },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Run(actions).Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20855827Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<XmlTag> ParseElement(XmlReader reader, XmlTag element)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<XmlTag>() { element };Di2015NewLine    while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (reader.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.Element:Di2015NewLine                element.IsContainer = true;Di2015NewLine                var newTag = new XmlTag() { XML_TAG = reader.Name };Di2015NewLine                if (reader.IsEmptyElement)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(newTag);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.AddRange(ParseElement(reader, newTag));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.Text:Di2015NewLine                element.XML_VALUE = reader.Value;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case XmlNodeType.EndElement:Di2015NewLine                if (reader.Name == element.XML_TAG)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(new XmlTag()Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            XML_TAG = string.Format("/{0}", reader.Name),Di2015NewLine                            IsContainer = element.IsContainerDi2015NewLine                        });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static List<XmlTag> ParseXml(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<XmlTag>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var reader = XmlReader.Create(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.AddRange(ParseElement(Di2015NewLine                    reader,Di2015NewLine                    new XmlTag() { XML_TAG = reader.Name }));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.EndElement)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(new XmlTag() Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        XML_TAG = string.Format("/{0}",current.Name)Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20861831Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool CheckTransactionDates(string line)Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine   // in the actual code this is dynamically set based on other variablesDi2015NewLine   int month = DateTime.Now.Month;Di2015NewLine   int daysInMonth = DateTime.DaysInMonth(DateTime.Today.Year, DateTime.Today.Month);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Regex pattern = new Regex(string.Format(@"{0:00}-(?<DAY>[0123][0-9])", month));Di2015NewLine   int day = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   foreach (Match match in pattern.Matches(line))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (int.TryParse(match.Groups["DAY"].Value, out day))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (day <= daysInMonth)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
